spatial_accuracy.notes: Several wall alignments are incorrect, especially in the living room and kitchen area. Door placements are frequently incorrect, and window placements are mostly inaccurate with multiple E1 and E2 errors. Room proportions are distorted in several areas, particularly the kitchen and the bathroom adjacent to the rear bedroom.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is inconsistent, with some walls appearing thicker in the render. Door embedding is incorrect, often showing unnecessary frames or placements that block the full door swing path. Several adjacency relationships are altered, especially in the kitchen/dining area and the living room. Multiple rooms have incorrect or missing elements compared to the floor plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement accuracy is poor, with many items either moved or missing. Furniture scale consistency is also an issue, with some items appearing oversized or undersized relative to the room.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The isometric camera angle is generally correct, and orthographic projection is attempted. Lighting quality is flat and lacks dynamic range. Geometry is mostly clean but some elements like the sink and some furniture pieces appear distorted. Visual clarity is moderate, but composition is hindered by structural inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Living area wall is significantly misplaced and resized, creating a smaller living space.
Kitchen wall alignment is incorrect; the L-shaped counter from the floor plan is represented as a straight line, altering the kitchen layout and size.
Missing L-shaped counter extension in the kitchen.
Dining area wall is extended unnecessarily, encroaching on the kitchen space envisioned by the floor plan.
Front entrance door is moved to an interior wall rather than being an exterior door.
Orientation of the front entrance door is incorrect (swings inward instead of outward).
Door leading from living room to bedroom 1 is misplaced and has incorrect orientation.
Door leading from living room to bathroom is misplaced and has incorrect orientation.
Missing window in the bathroom adjacent to the rear bedroom.
Bathroom layout and fixtures (shower and sink) are incorrectly placed and proportioned.
Missing window in the bedroom near the front entrance.
Window in the kitchen is misplaced and incorrectly sized.
Missing two windows in the main living/dining area (left and right walls).
Windows in the front-left bedroom are misplaced and fewer in number.
Bathroom (front-left portion) proportions are significantly distorted, appearing much larger than in the floor plan, even with missing elements.
Kitchen and dining area proportions are distorted due to wall misalignment.
Dining table and chairs are significantly misplaced and scaled incorrectly.
Missing floor fan element in the living area.
Missing floor fan element in the bedroom next to the bathroom.
The refrigerator and washing machine placements are swapped.
Missing wall cabinet in the main bedroom where the TV is placed in the render.
